titles.title: All People That on Earth Do Dwell

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All people that on earth do dwell, sing to the Lord with cheerful voice. Serve him with joy, his praises tell, come now before him and rejoice!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Know that the Lord is God indeed; he formed us all without our aid. We are the flock he comes to feed, the sheep who by his hand were made.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O enter then his gates with joy, within his courts his praise proclaim. Let thankful songs your tongues employ. O bless and magnify his name.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: For why? the Lord our God is good, His mercy is forever sure. His faithfulness at all times stood and shall from age to age endure.
